title: Bug 49536 - URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps deployed
description: When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, the server returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL in the Tomcat 7 instance
4. Check the returned HTTP code

Expected result:
The server should return an HTTP error 404.
